a me come gioco e piaciuto molto apparte un bug che mi ha costretto a disintallare gioco.
il bug consiste che aprendo il gioco e caricando una partita e subito dopo mi riporta alla schermata del titolo.
potete risolvere?
One of my favorite games to sit back and play for 5 hours straight before realizing how long I've played, the community maps are great and add a great life extender to this terrific game.
Big brain game for big brain nibbas
It is a fun game to play with one of your Friends or sibling.
Amazing sequel. With Fun puzzles, Funny dialog, and a Good story. A must play if you enjoyed the first.
This game is awesome. I love everything about it and its so fun.
By and far my favorite puzzle game. Iconic soundtrack, amazing characters, all in all a absolute 10/10 game.
I loved this game! Its very fun the the bosses get real cool! I really think its a good game and I like it!
was really engaging! the puzzles were not to hard but not to easy. the humor was enjoyable but not in your face. 10/10 would recommend!

Its a good game with alot of replay value! Not as much as somke other games but still, very nice! To be honest, im not the smartest person, and had some trouble in some puzzles. The Story is kinda good, but it would be nice if there were more options to interact with the characters. Eventho i had Trouble solving every puzzle, i still enjoyed every second of it! Because its very Linear, i dont have to say that much about this game! Total score: 8/10

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life, take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
One of the best games ever made
Amazing Game. One of the few times that a sequel is better than the original.

This is my favorite game of all time. It has a compelling story, good graphics, unique mechanics, and compelling characters. The portal mechanic is flawless and always has been. The modding community has amazing mods that are so good that you forget your not playing the official game. The one warning I have is the humor gets dark at times so if your not a fan of that keep that in mind. This game is amazing and I highly recommend it.
